data_table.description: SF-12 Health Survey Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SFE1
variable.description: Q1. Rate general health [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE2A
variable.description: Q2a. Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE2B
variable.description: Q2b. Climbing several flights of stairs limited [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE3A
variable.description: Q3a. Times in past 4 weeks accomplished less due to physical health [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE3B
variable.description: Q3b. Times in past 4 weeks limited in activities due to physical health [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE4A
variable.description: Q4a. Times in past 4 weeks accomplished less due to emotional problems [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE4B
variable.description: Q4b. Times in past 4 weeks worked less carefully due to emotional problems [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE5
variable.description: Q5. Frequency in past 4 weeks pain interfered with normal work [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE6A
variable.description: Q6a. Time in past 4 weeks feeling calm and peaceful [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE6B
variable.description: Q6b. Time in past 4 weeks having a lot of energy [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE6C
variable.description: Q6c. Time in past 4 weeks feeling depressed [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE7
variable.description: Q7. Time in past 4 weeks physical health or emotional problems interfered with social activities [SF-12 Health Survey]

variable.name: SFE0AY
variable.description: Q0a. Year of completion date [SF-12 Health Survey]
